source:
<!--
  ## Introduction

  Use the [`amp-springboard-player`](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-springboard-player-v0.1.md) component to embed videos hosted on the Springboard Video Platform in your AMP HTML files.
--><!-- -->
<!doctype html>
<html ⚡>
<head>
<meta charset="utf-8">
  <title>amp-springboard-player</title>
  <script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>
  <!-- ## Setup -->
  <!--
    Import the `amp-springboard-player` component in the header.
  -->
  <script async custom-element="amp-springboard-player" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-springboard-player-0.1.js"></script>
  <link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/components/amp-springboard-player/index.html">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
  <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
</head>
<body>

  <!-- ## Basic usage -->
  <!--
    Embed videos hosted on the Springboard Video Platform via the `data-site-id`, `data-domain`, `data-player-id`, `data-content-id` attributes.
    The `data-mode` attribute is used to determine if this is a single video or playlist.  If it's a playlist, the `data-items` attribute specifies the number of items in the playlist. We recommend using the responsive layout for videos.
  -->
  <amp-springboard-player data-site-id="261" data-mode="video" data-content-id="1578473" data-player-id="test401" data-domain="test.com" data-items="10" layout="responsive" width="480" height="270">
  </amp-springboard-player>
</body></html>

sections.doc_:
## Introduction

Use the [`amp-springboard-player`](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-springboard-player-v0.1.md) component to embed videos hosted on the Springboard Video Platform in your AMP HTML files.
sections.cachedMarkedDoc:
Introduction

Use the amp-springboard-player component to embed videos hosted on the Springboard Video Platform in your AMP HTML files.
sections.normalizedDoc_:
## Introduction

Use the [`amp-springboard-player`](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-springboard-player-v0.1.md) component to embed videos hosted on the Springboard Video Platform in your AMP HTML files.

sections.doc_: Import the `amp-springboard-player` component in the header.
sections.normalizedDoc_: Import the `amp-springboard-player` component in the header.

sections.code:
<link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/components/amp-springboard-player/index.html">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
<style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
</head>
<body>

sections.doc_:
Embed videos hosted on the Springboard Video Platform via the `data-site-id`, `data-domain`, `data-player-id`, `data-content-id` attributes.
The `data-mode` attribute is used to determine if this is a single video or playlist.  If it's a playlist, the `data-items` attribute specifies the number of items in the playlist. We recommend using the responsive layout for videos.
sections.code:
<amp-springboard-player data-site-id="261"
  data-mode="video"
  data-content-id="1578473"
  data-player-id="test401"
  data-domain="test.com"
  data-items="10"
  layout="responsive"
  width="480"
  height="270">
</amp-springboard-player>
sections.preview:
<amp-springboard-player data-site-id="261"
    data-mode="video"
    data-content-id="1578473"
    data-player-id="test401"
    data-domain="test.com"
    data-items="10"
    layout="responsive"
    width="480"
    height="270">
  </amp-springboard-player>
sections.normalizedDoc_:
Embed videos hosted on the Springboard Video Platform via the `data-site-id`, `data-domain`, `data-player-id`, `data-content-id` attributes.
The `data-mode` attribute is used to determine if this is a single video or playlist.  If it's a playlist, the `data-items` attribute specifies the number of items in the playlist. We recommend using the responsive layout for videos.
